alert.note: Alert for Butts; Jasper; Monroe; Putnam (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 30 at 12:17PM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Putnam, north central Monroe, southeastern Butts and central Jasper Counties through 1245 PM EST... At 1217 PM EST, a strong thunderstorm was near McElheneys Crossroads, or 8 miles east of Jackson, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...40 mph wind and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Eatonton, Monticello, Flovilla, Shady Dale, Harmony, Warfield, Willard, Rock Eagle 4-H Center, Central Georgia Experiment Stn, High Falls State Park, Blount, McElheneys Crossroads, Indian Springs State Park and Adgateville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
